attributes.action: actually do some of things suggested on the petitions ?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Your beta test statement says that you are responding to feedback - well my feedback is that there has been no feedback ... no action ... no icnentive ... the petitioner is calling on the P.M. to explain the feasibility of an expensive project, poorly monitored and supervised, that has left my daughter in tears and afraid to leave the house because of cyber - bullying, when she has been invited to submit ideas to her government, which presumably acts in the interests of it's citizens. Send someone senior to sort this out or the brothers will.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
